summary: This mod adds standalone female followers to your Skyrim. When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary. Please create your private squad when as you like. In Ver.03, own scripts and custom voices of Ellie and Skuld have been added. As for the other followers, update is planned. Ellie, Skuld, Hotaru and Ursula transform themselves when
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/abyssal-dremora-race/][/url][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/vKbLVq7.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ta3V5Rm.png[/img][/center][color=red]
[/color][center][size=4]This follower mod is STANDALONE.[/size][size=4]
When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary.

[color=#ff0000]!! V03 Updated (2/1/2017) !![/color]
[color=#ffff00]In Ver.V03, [/color][color=#ff0000]OWN SCRIPTS and[/color][color=#ffff00] [/color][color=#ff0000]CUSTOM VOICES[/color][color=#ffff00] [/color][color=#ffff00] of Ellie and Skuld have been added.
As for the other followers, update is planned.

Japanese voice-over and Japanese subtitle, or Japanese voice-over and English subtitle will be able to select by FOMOD. English voice-over is not available.
If previous version(V02L or later) has already been installed, please reinstall this version after entire uninstallation as unexpected operations or bugs could be caused without uninstallation.[/color]

(～V02N1)If you install the mod using NMM, it gives option to install all at once or individually.
When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary. 
[/size][size=4]Skyrim version has to be 1.9.32.0 or higher.[/size]

[color=#00ffff][size=5]!! DLC: Dawnguard / Dragonborn REQUIRED !![/size][/color][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/2sDAcb9.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WtY5juj.png?1[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/TCUMruZ.gif[/img]

[color=#ffe599]Japanese voice-over and Japanese subtitle, or Japanese voice-over and English subtitle will be able to select by FOMOD.
English voice-over is not available.[/color]

[color=#dd7e6b][size=4]Sample Voices
[/size][/color]
[youtube]3PwHO60XPWk[/youtube]
[youtube]CaVd2udplD8[/youtube]

[size=3]In V03, own scripts and custom voices of Ellie and Skuld have been added. As for the other followers, update is planned.[/size]
[color=#ffe599]Ellie, Skuld, Hotaru and Ursula transform themselves when certain conditions are met in the battles.[/color][size=3] They use amazing force to beat enemies. [/size]

[size=3]Arielle, Tullia and Nei are NOT transformable.[/size]


[size=3][color=#e06666]NOTE[/color]
[color=#ffe599]If you hire multiple voice followers, please use MOD for extensive follower.

Otherwise, the custom voice follower you have already hired leave you as their follower mode is canceled.
Please note, It is not recommended to manage these custom voice followers
with only FLP as it could cause any abnormal operation.

If you would like to use FLP, using with EFF or AFT is recommended.

"If EFF has already been installed, you will need a mindcontrol spell to hire multiple custom voice followers. 

 exa.) Select ""help mindcontrol"" in console and acquire the spell by ""player addspell XXX(mindcontrol ID)"""

Even with AFT or UFO, you may not be able to hire multiple custom voice followers unless you apply each independent MOD management function(Management spell etc.) respectively.[/color][/size]


[color=#c9daf8][size=4]■Ellie■[/size][/color]
- Spellsword
- Has acquired own spell "Sound od Silence" (Fortified Magic)
- Skillful at magic attack and Skillful one-handed sword attack
- Transform into Ouroboros
A Quarter High-elf. She had been so loved by her family that her birth mother even hated her.
Her mother cursed Ellie to transfigure into ugly one when she was a child.
After the banishment from the family, Ellie had lived alone deep in the forest of Valenwood for a long, long time until you came to her.
Ellie's hopeless fate was changed by the encounter. 
After that, she gradually started to place her trust on you., going on a journey together.
Because of your help, the power of curse was going weak and Ellie's appearance was also going back to herself little by little.
However, once you are hurt, Ellie transforms herself again with anger.
Ellie and you lost each other at near Helgen.
Now, she is waiting for you at the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun, where is the place you promised her to meet at.

[color=#b6d7a8][size=4]■Skuld■[/size][/color]
- Warrior
- Has acquired own Shout Disarm, Unrelenting Force, Cyclone, Dragon Aspect Shout
- Skillful at close range attack.
- Transform into Dragoon
A homunculus. She is an artificial living arm which was designed to have equal power to Dragonborn's.
She was created at an institution, which reutilized the ruins of Dwemer, somewhere in Skyrim.　
She is a clone of Zinnia, the first finished-product. She has regarded Zinnia as her older sister ever since she was created. 
Skuld, however, was not well-made as Zinnia. When Skuld was about to be disposed, Zinnia sacrificed herself to save Skuld.
She destroyed the institution completely, letting Skuld get away to survive.
After that, Skuld was protected and raised by The Greybeards.
Now, as she caught wind of a rumor that there is a Dragonborn, she is staying at Drunken huntsman in Whiterun.

[color=#c27ba0][size=4]■Hotaru■[/size][/color]
- Ninja
- Has acquired own Ninjyutu Katon
- Skillful at close range very speedy attack and Skillful at shooting
- Transform into Dragoon
While it is said that she is a descendant of Akaviri, her origin is unclear in fact.
She was sold to an assassin guild which was considered to be Dark Brotherhood
when she was a little child, and grew up in a tough environment.
While she was gifted killer to be an ace in the guild, one of the guild members betrayed her and got her injured heavily.
She made her good escape from the guild, losing her right eye.
Thereafter she wandered aimlessly whole Tamriel. One day, she met a clown. The clown deceived her to heal her lost right eye.
However, the clown implanted a deadric artifact(name unknown) in instead.
The implanted eye became so baleful that she was able to create her shadow. She usually hides her right eye with eyepatch.
She has been hunting for the clown. At this moment, she is staying at Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

[color=#dd7e6b][size=4]■Ursula■[/size][/color]
- Berserker
- Skillful at close range attack
- Transform into Dragoon
A lycanthropy werewolf. Origin unclear. She grew up with wolves ever since she was born.
When she got separated from the herd she was taken under Companions' protection. After that, she was raised as a human.
She can hide her tail but ears. When she bleeds too much in the battles, she transforms herself into figure like a werewolf.
As she has a strong fighting instinct, she loves to battle. With her gifted skill and stature,
she has best combat efficiency among the members of Companions.
She is looking forward to meeting someone stronger than her some day.
She still belongs to Companions. She is often seen at the back of Jorrvaskr.

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]■Arielle■[/size][/color]
- Vamire Hunter
- Skillful at shooting
-  Silver-Blood Inn in Markarth

[color=#a64d79][size=4]■Tullia■[/size][/color]
- Imperial Soldier
- Skillful at close range attack
- Blue Palace in Solitude

[color=#b6b6b6][size=4]■Nei■[/size][/color]
- Witch
- Skillful at magic attack
- New Gnisis Cornerclub in the Gray Quarter of Windhelm


[color=#ffd966][size=4]■Condition of transformation■[/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#cfe2f3]Ellie:[/color]
In the battle. When player's hearth goes below 50% and her hearth greater than 50%.
Transforms into Ouroboros and unalters after end battle.

[color=#b6d7a8]Skuld:[/color]
Condition of transformation: In the battle. When her hearth goes below 50%.
Transforms into Dragoon and unalters after 60 seconds passed.

[color=#d5a6bd]Hotaru:[/color]
Condition of transformation: In the battle. When her hearth goes below 50%.
Transforms into Grim Reaper and unalters after 60 seconds passed.

[color=#ea9999]Ursula:[/color]
Condition of transformation: In the battle. When her hearth goes below 50%.
Transforms into Werewolf and unalters after 60 seconds passed.[/size][/center]
[center][color=#e06666][size=4]■Compulsive Transformation Spells for Ellie/Skuld/Hotatu/Ursula■[/size][/color]
About compulsive transformation spells.
When their spell scrolls are acquired you can force them to be transformed by using the spell scrolls to them.[/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xcU9x0r.png?1[/img][/center][center]Please refer to [url=https://youtu.be/fxyLoiSsQRM]"Private Squad V02L Spell Tome:Force Trans"(YouTu)[/url][/center]
[center][color=#a4c2f4]
[color=#e06666][size=4]■Ellie's Hairstyling Spell■[/size][/color][/color]
About Ellie's hairstyling spell.
Ellie has spell scrolls for hairstyling. Optional hairstyle will be available by using the spells on her.[/center]
[center][youtube]tRnL_rYTozk[/youtube][/center]
[center][color=#f4cccc][size=3]Please refer to README for the details.
I hope you enjoy your journey and adventure with them in your Skyrim world.
詳しくはREADMEを参照願います。ご一読ください。
彼女達があなたのスカイリムであなたと共に冒険し、道中を楽しんで頂けたら幸いです。
[/size][/color][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xGZ2bFd.png[/img][/center][center][color=#d9d2e9][size=4]Installation [/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Please do CLEAN INSTALL and LOAD ORDER optimization.
If you do not do CLEAN INSTALL, It is possible that it may become the cause of a bug(neck seem, missing).
[/color]
[NMM]
Download via NMM or drag the archive into NMM and activate.
Simple and easy to implement in Fomod.　

[Manual]*I hardly recommended*
Unpack the archive and copy the contents into your Skyrim install folder, and activate in Data Files when loading Skyrim.


[color=#d9d2e9][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/color]
Dismiss them from your active followers.
[NMM]
Deactivate the mod in NMM and delete.
[Manual]
In your Skyrim Data directory, delete the following files & folders.

[b][/b][color=#d9ead3][size=4]Last, but definitely not least,
I would like to express my sincere thanks to my friends for their support,
all the modders for providing amazing works,
the voice actors for playing fabulously and the translator for translating the scripts.
最後に、私を支えてくれた友人達、素晴らしい仕事をし提供して下さっているモッダーの皆さん、最高の演技を下さった声優さん、台詞を翻訳下さった翻訳家様へ、多大な感謝を。[/size][/color]

BTRH'79

[color=#d9d2e9][size=3]My other mod[/size][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/A1tZZmt.jpg[/img][/center]
